publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the information of the commonalty of England, France, and all other neighbor nations, that groan under the oppression of tyrannical government,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 15." The 9 in the date has been crossed out and replaced with "1648".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: France, and all other neighbor nations, that groan under the oppression of tyrannical government
the information of the commonalty of England
